Game information:

McDROID - dynamic hybrid of third-person shooter, tauerdefa, bullet hell'a,
and real-time strategy! Once on a hostile planet, protect your ship from a
variety of unseen creatures that will mutate, spoil soil, and even pay your
charges against you.
In a combat robot farmer called McDROID crashed debris, and he crash landed
on a mysterious planet M.
There were many suitable for the collection of strawberries, but to get it
is not so simple, because it is guarded by the evil creatures.
Soak them mounted on your back with a laser.
